title: Underground parking garage, Front loading washer and dryer
posting_body: Think Outside the Square at L Seven SoMa San Francisco Apartments for Rent
If you’ve been looking for the ideal SoMa apartments, allow us to introduce you to L Seven.
This modern community of studio, one, and two bedroom homes offers you the residential experience you deserve.
At our community, we strive to build, create, and perfect everything we touch.
Just steps from your front door, indulge in all of the options that surround our SoMa, San Francisco CA apartments.
Head to a live performance, dinner with friends, or a day in the sun at Yerba Buena Gardens.
It’s all right here at L Seven.
Contact us today to schedule a tour.
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 472 Sq.
- Comcast Infinity HD Digital Cable with 199 channels included
- Kitchen island or breakfast bar with pendant lighting
- Electric car charging stations available for rental
- Virtual moving concierge complimentary address change, set up home services
- Underground gated parking garage with direct access elevators (monthly fee for parking)
- Electric car charging stations available for rental
- 24-hour fitness center featuring resort-quality cardio and strength training equipment, free weights
- Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services
- The Hub by Amazon and Luxor One: package lockers with 24/7 access to packages
- Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply)
- The Hub by Amazon and Luxor One: package lockers with 24/7 access to packages
We’re a pet-passionate community and welcome two pets per household.
Canine breed restrictions apply, so please ask our on-site leasing team for our complete pet policy.
